channel.title: Make certain items not show on death?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to make an array or something that doesn't show certain items on death for the person that pked you, but you can run back and pick them up?
=\
For example,
Player one is wearing fire cape and torso, Player two kills player one and receives all his items in a drop, all but his firecape and torso. Player one runs back and picks up his firecape and torso, that player two cannot see..
- Jayden

item.title: Make certain items not show on death?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

JaydenD12:

Umm…

Oh sorry lolz, back to helping you.

As I said back up there ^^ its something like that but its not fully done…

Read full topic

item.title: Make certain items not show on death?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Thats a tuffy…

I’m only spitballing but im guessing something like…

if (afterdeath.itemID{
ItemVisible= Username.OfDeath
ItemNotVisible= Username
if (NotPickedUp.p.Timer > 60) {
}
}

Im seriously not sure how to code from scartch so im just guessing…
